name: The Y-Front
description:
A 3D forward-scrolling shooter intended to be rendered completely in the Windows Command Prompt... now painstakingly rendered in an HTML5 Canvas!

Play as Robot Theodore Roosevelt and fight your way through five levels to save the universe from Robot Armageddon.

This was developed as a freshman game project at DigiPen and released in 2010. The original version can be found here. That version is less buggy, too :P
